title: Lihzahrd Altar
summaries: The Lihzahrd Altar is found naturally placed in the final chamber of the Jungle Temple, and is used with a Lihzahrd Power Cell to summon the Golem boss. Each summoning consumes one Lihzahrd Power Cell from the player's inventory.

Like Lihzahrd Bricks, the Lihzahrd Altar can only be removed with the Picksaw, Laser Drill, or Luminite Pickaxes. Once picked up, the Lihzahrd Altar can be placed anywhere and used to summon the Golem in any area, as long as Plantera has been defeated in the current world.
